div.div: Yearly anomalies of P, PET, CWD (P-PET), and TWA from 1982 to 2013; the linear trends of annual values of the above three variables are calculated by the Kendall-Theil robust line and shown as dashed lines.
div.p: Grey areas denote the min-max ensemble range as a relative measure of uncertainty in the global calculations. The color scheme of the MEI is the same as in Fig. 2.; *P < 0.1, ** P < 0.05. This figure was created using the IDL Core Version 7.1.2.
